Reviews.Title: Intercom doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: The doorbell and video work great.  The intercom is terrible.  You can't hear anything unless you are 2 or 3 inches from the speaker and that is not understandable.  I'm keeping it because when the doorbell rings I am able to see the person outside before opening the front door.

Reviews.Title: Battery life short & difficult to recharge
Reviews.Author: Richard Cunningham
Reviews.Content: The camera and display work well enough but the battery in the camera only lasts about 5 days before completely discharging.  After you have the camera mounted, it is difficult to remove it from the bracket it mounts in.  It has to be removed from the mount to recharge the battery as the plug-in charger plugs into the back of the camera.  They should have made it so you could plug in the charger without removing it from the mounting bracket.

Reviews.Title: does not work properly
Reviews.Author: John T Stevenson
Reviews.Content: can not pair the camera with the receiving units for more than a few minutes. also, camera battery only lasts 2 days on standby, not two weeks or months. I asked for a full refund but was ignored!~ I would NOT recommend this vendor

Reviews.Title: Wireless Video Door Phone Intercom Doorbell Home Security 1-camera 2 Monitors
Reviews.Author: B. Aguilar "quis custodiet ipsos custodes?"
Reviews.Content: I love this door phone. It works great. I took it into the restroom turn off all lights and the video was clear. As far as the camera I left my unit plugged in and it is working great. I think the battery on the camera is in case the power goes out then you have a few hours of running time.PRO: Great Camera, Several doorbell rings, Takes and Saves Pictures, Wireless for super easy installation.CONS: Small video Screen, Poor Instructions, Power Cord Not Long Enough.All in all I would recommend this product for any home or business. I was able to buy this product from another Web-site a little cheaper, but I buy a lot from Amazon and wanted everyone who buys from Amazon to know this product is well worth it price.
